articles.title: DPRK's Stand on Satellite Launch for Peaceful Purposes Re-clarified
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand on Satellite Launch for Peaceful Purposes Re-clarified
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Thursday as regards the March 24 statement clarifying the DPRK's stand on its satellite launch for peaceful purposes:
					 In the statement we sternly warned that if such hostile act is committed in the name of the UN Security Council as to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK while denying its right to peaceful use of space, it will just mean the UNSC's denial of the September 19 joint statement.
					
					 Some media are, however, releasing reports with a deliberate misinterpretation that the hostile act of the UNSC would be confined only to such strong measures as application of "sanctions" and adoption of "a resolution" against the DPRK.
					
					 Lurking behind this is a foolish ploy of the hostile forces to blame the DPRK's satellite launch in the name of the UNSC and avoid its consequences under any circumstances.
					
					 We would like to remind once again that there are not a few countries in the world that launched satellites but the UNSC has never dealt with nor taken issue with the satellite launches by other individual countries.
					
					 The UNSC's discussion on the DPRK's projected satellite launch for peaceful purposes itself, to say nothing of its adoption of any  document containing even a single word critical of the launch  whether in the form of a "presidential statement" or a "press statement", will be regarded as a blatant hostile act against the DPRK.
					
					 The moment the September 19 joint statement is ignored due to such act the six-party talks will come to an end, all the processes for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, which have been pushed forward so far, will be brought back to what used to be before their start and necessary strong measures will be taken.

articles.title: All-out Actions against Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Called for
articles.content:
All-out Actions against Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Called for
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea in an "appeal to all Koreans" on Mar. 25 disclosed the anti-reunification, treacherous and unpopular nature of the Lee Myung Bak group and called upon all the compatriots to turn out in the struggle against the group.
					 The appeal said: The situation of the Korean Peninsula has been driven into the worst crisis due to the south Korean conservative authorities' moves for extreme confrontation with the DPRK. No one can predict when this will spark off a nuclear war which will bring horrible disasters to the Koreans.
					
					 The group of traitors has not an iota of national consciousness but is steeped in the idea of depending on outside forces and sycophancy towards the U.S., the appeal noted, and continued:
					
					 "No nukes" touted by the group is aimed to disarm the DPRK and pave the way for the U.S. and Japan, its masters, to invade the DPRK and its loudmouthed "opening" is designed to stand up against the system of the DPRK and foster the confrontation between the differing two systems. This has already been brought to light.
					
					 Only scream is heard from all parts of south Korea due to the worst economic crisis and the deterioration of the people's living and this prompts the group of traitors to set out on mendicant diplomacy in a bid to bring the situation under control with the help of foreign monopoly capital. This being a hard reality, the group put up the watchword of "3 000 dollars" only to be a laughing stock of the world people. Even a mere child knows that the above-said watchword is nothing but a crafty and poor trick to hoodwink the public.
					
					 The "lost decade" and the like oft-repeated by the group are no more than a ploy not only to totally deny the stirring inter-Korean relations, the fruition of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, but bring to naught everything gained through the struggle of the south Korean people for social democracy and other actions.
					
					 Calling upon all the compatriots in the north and the south and overseas to resolutely reject the sycophantic and treacherous idea of giving priority to outside forces advocated by the Lee group and firmly protect the dignity and interests of the nation under the banner of "By our nation itself", the appeal went on: 
					
					It is imperative to repudiate and denounce the watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" aimed at hamstringing any effort to warm up the inter-Korean relations and inciting confrontation and war put up by the Lee group, availing itself of foreign forces' nuclear racket against the DPRK, and throw them into the dumping ground of history.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should decisively smash the reckless moves of the U.S. and the Lee group to start a war of aggression against the DPRK, giving top priority to the security of the nation irrespective of ism and partisan interests and strategy.
					
					 South Korea can never get rid of the present confusion and crisis nor can the inter-Korean relations improve as long as such fascist dictators and anti-reunification and confrontation-minded elements as the Lee group are allowed to ride roughshod there.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas, sternly judge the group of traitors for negating the historic north-south declarations and refusing to implement them!
					
					 Throw overboard all the ultra-right anti-reunification and confrontation-minded elements running riot in league with traitor Lee!
					
					 Bring a definite end to the Lee group of traitors, the root cause of all sorts of calamities, by carrying forward the glorious tradition of the April 19, May 18 and June popular resistance struggles! 
					
					 The appeal called upon them to turn out as one in a nation-wide march to open up the gate to the country's reunification in 2012, the historic year, true to the great Songun leadership.

articles.title: Independence Day of Bangladesh Marked
articles.content:
Independence Day of Bangladesh Marked
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the DPRK-Bangladesh Friendship Pyongyang Puksu Middle School on Thursday to mark the 38th independence day of Bangladesh.
					 It was attended by the chairperson and members of the DPRK-Bangladesh Friendship Association and teaching staff and students of the school.
					
					 The chairperson of the association made a speech at the meeting.
					
					 Then, the participants appreciated an art performance given by students of the school.

articles.title: Costumes for Artistes Donated by China
articles.content:
Costumes for Artistes Donated by China
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Culture of China donated costumes for artistes involved in the opera "The Dream of the Red Chamber" now being created in the DPRK.
					 The Phibada Opera Troupe is re-creating the opera as required by the new century this year, the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and China. This opera had been created and performed on the basis of the Chinese famous classic novel of the same title in the 1960s.
					
					 The costumes include those for the artistes playing leading roles, figurants and figurantes and dancers who are presenting dances such as lotus and butterfly dances in the opera.
					
					 The opera will colorfully adorn "the year of DPRK-China Friendship" and contribute to the development of the friendly relations between the two peoples.

articles.title: Veterinary and Anti-epizootic Work in DPRK
articles.content:
Veterinary and Anti-epizootic Work in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A veterinary and anti-epizootic campaign is being vigorously launched in the DPRK in the March-April veterinary and anti-epizootic months.
					U Song Rim, director of the Central Veterinary and Anti-epizootic Center, said in an interview with KCNA that the veterinary and anti-epizootic work is now raised as an important problem than ever before.
					
					He went on:
					
					The center gives much effort to hygienic and vaccination work in the change of season.
					
					The provincial, city and county veterinary and anti-epizootic centers give precedence to the production of preventives to ensure vaccination work smoothly.
					
					The centers also see to it that all the stock-breeding farms and units establish strict veterinary and anti-epizootic order.
					
					In particular, the anti-avian flu activities are being conducted under the unified guidance of the State Emergency Anti-epidemic Commission.
					
					The migrants are always under surveillance of the migrants observation posts in east and west coasts, northern border areas and other parts of the country and the poultry farms conduct serum test on poultry regularly.

articles.title: Preparatory Work for New School Year in Full Swing
articles.content:
Preparatory Work for New School Year in Full Swing
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The preparatory work for the new school year is in full swing in the DPRK with the new school year (April 1) approaching.
					 The government saw to it that the teachers have improved the teaching content and method and constantly raised the level of scientific theory and their educational and practical qualities to meet the requirements of the developing reality.
					
					 It organizes courses for reeducation of teachers so that they may teach the students better with a wide range of knowledge and common sense of their special subjects and relevant subjects.
					
					 Having already worked out the teaching programs for the new school year, the educational institutions are down to detail the work of supplementing scientific experimental equipment and apparatus for proper combination of experiment and practice with the object lessons.
					
					 Meanwhile, they are organizing teaching contests, shows of teaching aids and furnishings and the like in line with the actual conditions, and are generalizing examples among teachers.
					
					 The people's committees at all levels, acquainting themselves with the actual conditions of the educational institutions in detail, are taking positive measures to provide them with all educational means such as school fixtures, experimental and practical apparatus, sports and cultural equipment and materials and teaching tools for the new school year at an early date.
					
					 The Educational Books Publishing House and other printing, paper-making and daily-necessities factories in different parts of the country are giving priority to the production of textbooks, notebooks and other school things.
					
					 The supporters' organizations for school are doing their bit in rendering assistance to the schools.

articles.title: President Kim Il Sung's Desire Comes True
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung's Desire Comes True
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The area of Lake Samji of the DPRK has been turned into a beautiful cultural and recreation centre these years.
					 The camping centre for visitors, bridges, soft-drink stands and expedition roads were built on the shore of the lake in harmony with the landscape.
					
					 On the shore of the lake during the anti-Japanese armed struggle President Kim Il Sung said that a wonderful rest home for the people should be built there after the liberation of the country. His desire has become a reality at last.
					
					 The plans of the President are being translated into practice in the DPRK.
					
					 The instruction of the President on forming a powerful hydroelectric power generating base in Kangwon Province has been thoroughly implemented with the completion of the construction of Wonsan Youth Power Station in the beginning of this year following the construction of Anbyon Youth Power Station and large-scale hydroelectric power stations.
					
					 The Thaechon Power Station No.4 went into service a few years ago following the construction of various power stations with the result that the conception of the President for building a large hydroelectric power generating base in the northwest area of Korea by a new method of developing waterpower resources has been materialized with credit. 
					
					 The towns and the countryside are being converted into a socialist fairyland and paradise good to live in.
					
					 The land readjustment, tideland reclamation and gravity-fed waterway projects have been dynamically pushed ahead, changing the features of the land and opening up a bright vista for increasing agricultural production. 
					
					 Lots of modern stockbreeding bases and light industry factories have been built to realize the lifelong desire of the President for providing more cultured and happy life to the people. 
					
					The monumental edifices created in the Songun era are associated with the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who regards to put the President's lifelong desire into a brilliant reality as his lifelong mission and breaks through all difficulties for its materialization in the van.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Accusation against DPRK's Projected Satellite Launch Dismissed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Accusation against DPRK's Projected Satellite Launch Dismissed
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea has been busy with diplomacy, crying out for "stop to the missile launch" and "decisive countermeasure through international cooperation" since information about the DPRK's projected launch of experimental communications satellite was sent to the relevant international organizations. This is nothing but a groundless outcry of the political philistines ignorant of any legality of the study of space science for peaceful purposes.
					 Minju Joson Thursday says this in a signed commentary. 
					
					 It continues:
					
					 Outer space is not a monopoly of a few specified powers but an asset common to mankind and the space development is promoted worldwide at present.
					
					 The DPRK made public a plan to launch an experimental communications satellite in February in accordance with the state long-term plan for space development. Of late it provided the International Civil Aviation Organization and the International Maritime Organization with information necessary for the safe navigation of airliners and ships. These facts go to prove that the DPRK's projected satellite launch poses no problem.
					
					 The Lee group is stirring up a hornet's nest over the above-mentioned satellite launch, displeased with it. This is prompted by the fear that the DPRK's successful satellite launch may give further momentum to augmenting its national power and cause south Koreans to turn their minds to the DPRK and then this may amount to a telling blow to the group keen to stifle fellow countrymen, backed by  outsiders.
					
					 The group should have done something good for the sake of the nation. However, it has gone the lengths of frantically kicking up a confrontation racket against fellow countrymen, clinging to the coattails of outside forces, not content with the anti-DPRK smear campaign launched by it over the issue. It is a gang of wicked confrontational maniacs.
					
					 It is impossible to improve the inter-Korean relations nor is it possible to realize the desire of the nation for independent reunification, peace and prosperity as long as the group of traitors is allowed to stay in power in south Korea.
					
					 The Lee group had better behave itself, bearing in mind that its frantic moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen would only hasten its self-destruction, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Building of Self-Supporting National Economy Called for
articles.content:
Building of Self-Supporting National Economy Called for
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Self-support in the economy serves as a material foundation for political independence and provides a material guarantee for protecting sovereignty. In order to achieve self-support in the economy it is necessary to build an independent national economy.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article.
					
					 Only when a strong independent national economy is built and the economic potential is increased, is it possible for any country to solve all the problems arising in its internal and external affairs in conformity with its specific conditions and its people's requirements and interests and establish and develop good neighborly friendly relations with other countries on the principle of equality, mutual respect and mutual benefits, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Only when a country boosts its defence capability on the basis of its independent national economy can it reliably protect its sovereignty from foreign aggression.
					
					 What is important in building the said economy is to adhere to the principle of self-reliance and strengthen the south-south cooperation on the principle of collective self-reliance.
					
					 Self-reliance is the basic way of building a self-supporting economy. This is the way out for the developing countries and the way for them to achieve independent development and national prosperity.
					
					 The achievements made by the developing countries in the fields of science and technology at present serve as a driving force propelling the development of independent national economy and social progress in those countries.
					
					 The developing countries have rich natural resources and good experience and technology gained in the building of a new society. They are sure to achieve socio-economic development and progress without the help of the developed countries if they tap their human and economic and technical potentials to the maximum and boost the south-south cooperation.
					
					 The drive of the developing countries for accelerating the building of an independent national economy, a sure guarantee for defending the sovereignty, will get intensified as the days go by along with the trend of independence in the 21st century.

articles.title: Actions for Judging Lee Myung Bak Regime Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Judging Lee Myung Bak Regime Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea held a rally in Uijongbu, Kyonggi Province, on Mar. 22, calling upon all the people to turn out in the actions for judging the traitorous regime.
					 The organization deplored that the majority of people are undergoing misfortune and sufferings due to the Lee Myung Bak regime's unpopular policy seeking the interests of a tiny handful of privileged circle only.
					
					 It vowed to stage positive actions to foil the attempt of the authorities to railroad Lee's evil bills through the "National Assembly,'' protect the people's right to existence and put an end to the fascist dictatorial rule.
					
					 Noting that the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration is an urgent requirement of the times, it demanded the authorities roll back their hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The organization declared that it would consolidate itself to realize the wishes of the fellow countrymen for independence, democracy and reunification and boost the unity of the progressive camp in order to judge the Lee "government" without fail.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korean War Exercises Denounced in Pakistan
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korean War Exercises Denounced in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The National Workers' Party, the Organization for Afro-Asian People's Solidarity, the Peasants Committee and the Trade Union Federation of Pakistan, the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association and the Pakistan Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification released a joint statement on Mar. 18 in denunciation of the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers' Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					 The statement charged that the said exercises are nuclear war exercises aimed at making a preemptive strike at the DPRK in view of their scale and contents to all intents and purposes and grave military provocative acts of rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula so tense that a war may break out any moment.
					
					 We extend firm solidarity to the Korean people who love peace, oppose imperialism and work hard to achieve the peaceful reunification of the country, the statement said, demanding the U.S. replace the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace agreement and immediately withdraw its aggressor forces from south Korea.
					
					 We fully support the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Guinea
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Guinean preparatory committee to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was held in Conakry on Mar. 19.
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, at the ceremony praised the President, father of socialist Korea, as a great statesman who founded the immortal Juche idea, led the Korean revolution only to victory and clearly showed mankind the way of building an independent, new society.
					
					The exploits performed by the President for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence are precious treasures for mankind and they are now being successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he said, declaring that the preparatory committee would conduct positive activities to learn from the great revolutionary life of the President and deeply grasp the immortal exploits performed by him for the human cause of independence and extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at its inaugural ceremony.
					
					 The preparatory committee discussed a plan to organize various political and cultural events on the occasion of the centenary of birth of the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la obra de construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon.
					  El Dirigente estuvo primero en el campo de construccion del dique de la planta no. 1 de la Central.
					
					  Tras informarse del detallado plan operacional relativo a la edificacion del dique por parte del jefe de la unidad militar encargada de esta obra, el Dirigente recorrio el campo de la obra averiguando concretamente la formacion de los constructores militares y sus condiciones de vida.
					
					  Se mostro satisfecho de que el dique Ryongrim, que retendra un gran caudal, ocupa una posicion excelente y fue disenado bien ateniendose estrictamente al principio de rentabilidad.
					
					  Gracias a la lucha heroica de los constructores militares, en este lugar tranquilo, donde se oye ahora solo la corriente del agua, se levantara un gigantesco dique en un futuro no lejano y se acondicionara un lago artificial de gran dimension, destaco y llamo a librar una resuelta batalla ofensiva para adelantar el dia de la victoria.
					
					  Acto seguido, el Dirigente llego al campo de construccion del dique de la planta no. 2 de la Central.
					
					  Al ver como trabajan los constructores, reconocio los meritos de ellos, que luchan abnegadamente con el espiritu de la "Marcha penosa" de la decada de 1990, en que superaron severas dificultades con el espiritu de defender a la patria a costa de la vida y la determinacion de vida o muerte de la decada de 1950, subrayando que ellos hicieron ya muchas cosas aunque se trasladaron para aca hace poco.
					
					  Tras recorrer los repartos de construccion, presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para terminar la obra con adelanto.
					
					  Debemos resolver con prioridad el problema de electricidad para revitalizar los sectores prioritarios de la economia nacional como la industria metalurgica, considerada ahora por el PTC como clave de la construccion de una potencia economica, la carbonifera y el transporte ferroviario y para acelerar la reactivacion de la economia en su conjunto, senalo.
					
					  Diciendo que la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon de gran tamano es una grandiosa obra de transformacion de la naturaleza, enfatizo que para terminar hasta 2012 esta dificil y tremenda obra es necesario librar una ofensiva general movilizando a todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo.
					
					  Prosiguio que para terminar la obra dentro del plazo previsto, el Consejo de Ministros, los ministerios y los organos centrales deben tomar fuertes medidas para cumplir cabalmente las tareas asumidas con el fin de suministrar con preferencia y a tiempo los materiales, equipos e instalaciones necesarios a la construccion.
					
					  Resalto la importancia de observar estrictamente las exigencias de los metodos de construccion, diciendo que se debe asegurar al maximo la calidad de la construccion dado que esta Central es una valiosa riqueza de eterna duracion a ser legada a las generaciones venideras.
					
					 Es una tarea realmente dificilisima terminar en un corto periodo de 3 anos y medio esta obra, que requiere de mas de 10 anos segun la concepcion existente, pero estamos optimistas de la victoria porque contamos con la inagotable potencia espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo y con el respaldo de la potente industria jucheana, asevero. 
					
					 Por ultimo, expreso la conviccion de que los constructores responderan con orgullosos meritos a la confianza y la esperanza del partido al terminar incondicionalmente esta obra hasta el ano 2012 dando pruebas de su heroismo masivo e incomparable abnegacion.
					
					  Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang, Pak To Chun, y el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena a horda de Lee Myung Bak por el tema de satellite
FDRP llama a la lucha contra la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
FDRP llama a la lucha contra la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ATCC) -- En su proclama "A toda la nacion coreana" publicada el dia 25, el Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria (FDRP) revelo la naturaleza anti-reunificacion, antinacional y antipopular de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea y llamo a todos los coreanos a levantarse en la lucha contra esta camarilla.
					 Debido a las extremadas maniobras de enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana cayo ahora en la peor crisis, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					 Nadie sabe cuando esta situacion se convertira en la guerra nuclear que impondria a la nacion coreana tremendas calamidades.
					
					  La banda del traidor Lee no tiene ni un comino de conciencia nacional sino esta llena de la idea de apoyarse en las fuerzas foraneas y servir a EE.UU.
					
					 Ya es conocido por todo el mundo que la "desnuclearizacion", de que habla la banda del traidor Lee, es para desarmar a la RPDC y dar a sus amos norteamericano y japones las posibilidades de agredirla.
					
					 Ademas, la "apertura" parte de la negacion al regimen de la RPDC y persigue el enfrentamiento entre los sistemas del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					 Debido a la quiebra de la economia y la vida popular, todo el suelo surcoreano esta en agonia y para reparar esta situacion, la banda de Lee realiza la gira de limosneo suplicando la ayuda de los monopolios extranjeros. 
					
					Pese a esta realidad, la banda de Lee presento la supuesta teoria de "3,000 dolares" haciendo reir a todo el mundo.
					
					 Hasta los ninos saben que esta marana taimada y sucia es una medida seductiva.
					
					  Esa banda habla de los "10 anos perdidos" a fin de negar totalmente las conmovedoras relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur, que existieron desde la aprobacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hasta la de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, y echar por tierra todos los exitos logrados en la lucha de los habitantes surcoreanos incluyendo la democratizacion de la sociedad.
					
					  Bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben rechazar tajantemente la teoria vendepatria y servil a grandes potencias de la banda de Lee de dar prioridad a las fuerzas foraneas y defender firmemente la dignidad y los intereses de la nacion.
					
					Tambien, tienen que repudiar y echar al basurero de la historia la teoria de la "desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3,000 dolares", que rompen las relaciones N-S y persiguen la confrontacion y la guerra en adhesion a la campana anti-RPDC de las fuerzas extranjeras en el tema nuclear.
					
					  Deben frustrar sin falta las imprudentes maniobras belicas de la banda de Lee para agredir al Norte poniendo en el primer lugar la seguridad nacional por encima de las insistencias y los intereses fraccionalistas.
					
					  Mientras que los dictadores fascistas y elementos a favor del enfrentamiento anti-reunificacion como la banda de Lee Myung Bak actuen a su albedrio en el Sur de Corea, esta parte de la Peninsula Coreana no podra salir del caos y crisis ni se lograra la normalizacion de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					  !Que todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar enjuicien severamente a la banda del traidor Lee que niega las historicas declaraciones Norte-Sur y elude su ejecucion!
					
					  !Que expulsen a todos los elementos ultraderechistas en pro del enfrentamiento anti-reunificacion que actuan demencialmente poniendose al lado del traidor Lee!
					
					  !Que arruinen una vez por todas a la banda del traidor Lee, causa de todas las calamidades, dando continuidad a la orgullosa tradicion de la lucha del Levantamiento Popular del 19 de Abril, la Resistencia Popular del 18 de Mayo y la Insurreccion Popular de Junio!
					
					  Finalmente, el FDRP llamo a todos los compatriotas a levantarse como un solo hombre en la gigantesca marcha pannacional para abrir las puertas de la reunificacion de la patria en el historico e significativo ano 2012 acatando la magna direccion del Songun (priorizacion militar).

articles.title: Autarquia es garantia de soberania, subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Autarquia es garantia de soberania, subraya Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ATCC) -- En un articulo individual insertado hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun abogo por construir la economia nacional independiente destacando que la autarquia es la base material de la independencia politica y la garantia material de la defensa de la soberania. 
					  Solo cuando un pais sea fuerte economicamente mediante la construccion de la potente economia nacional independiente, podra resolver todos los asuntos nacionales e internacionales conforme a su realidad, a la demanda y los intereses de su pueblo, establecer y desarrollar las relaciones de buena vecindad y amistad con otros paises en el principio de igualdad, respeto reciproco y beneficios mutuos, senala el articulista y continua:
					
					  Tambien es necesario fortalecer la capacidad de defensa nacional basandose en la economia nacional independiente para salvaguardar la soberania del pais de la agresion de las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					   Lo importante de la construccion de la economia de ese tipo es observar el principio de apoyarse en las propias fuerzas e intensificar la cooperacion Sur-Sur en el principio de autoconfianza colectiva.
					
					 La autoconfianza es la clave de la independencia economica.
					
					 Igualmente, resulta la unica salvacion para los paises en vias de desarrollo y el camino que los conduce al desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad nacional.
					
					  Hoy en dia, los exitos cientifico-tecnicos, que se logran en esos paises, sirven de poderosas fuerzas impulsoras del desarrollo de la economia nacional independiente y del progreso social.
					
					  Ellos tienen abundantes recursos naturales, buenas experiencias y tecnologias alcanzadas en la construccion de la nueva sociedad.  Por lo tanto, si utilizan al maximo sus potencialidades humanas, economicas y tecnicas y desarrollan la cooperacion Sur-Sur, pueden lograr su desarrollo y progreso socioeconomicos sin la ayuda de los paises desarrollados.
					
					  La lucha de los paises en vias de desarrollo por acelerar la construccion de la economia nacional independiente tomara cada dia mas auge al igual que la corriente del siglo XXI hacia la independencia.
